effect_entries.effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
激しい　吹雪を
相手に　吹きつけて　攻撃する。
こおり状態に　することが　ある。

A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
the opposing Pokémon frozen.

Colpisce i nemici con una tremenda tempesta
di ghiaccio che può anche congelarli.

Ataca con contundentes puñetazos. Puede
destruir barreras como Pantalla de Luz y Reflejo.

Eine ungnädige Eis-und-Schnee-Attacke, die
Pokémon in der Nähe des Anwenders trifft
und eventuell einfrieren kann.

Une violente tempête de neige est déclenchée
sur l’ennemi. Peut aussi le geler.

세찬 눈보라를
상대에게 내뿜어 공격한다.
얼음 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

はげしい　ふぶきを　ぶつけて
こうげきする。　あいてを　こおりの
じょうたいに　することが　ある。

A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
the opposing team. It may also freeze
them solid.

A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
the opposing team. It may also freeze
them solid.

Une violente tempête de neige est
déclenchée sur l’ennemi. Peut aussi
le geler.

A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the foe. It may also freeze
the target solid.

A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the foe. It may also freeze
the target solid.

A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the foe. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The foe is blasted
with a blizzard.
It may freeze the
foe solid.

A brutal snow-and-
wind attack that
may freeze the foe.

A vicious snow-and-
wind attack that
may freeze the foe.
